entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 6:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning near noon then changing to ice pellets late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
